summary: “You're the best friend that I ever had I've been with you such a long time You're my sunshine and I want you to know That my...
caption:
“You’re the best friend that I ever had
I’ve been with you such a long time
You’re my sunshine and I want you to know
That my feelings are true
I really love you
Oh, you’re my best friend”

body:
Did I finish Good Omens in one sitting? Yes.

Did I nearly cry when it was over? Also yes.

Will I ever shut up about it?

I think the fuck not.

summary: Pop culture happy hour gave Good Omens a glowing review
body:
Pop culture happy hour gave Good Omens a glowing review

“David Tennant plays the demon, he’s doing full-on Bill Nye by way of Keith Richards.”

“The voice of God is Francis McDormont. Which is cheating, frankly.”

blog.name: niceprophecies
blog.title: PLEASE do not LICK the WALL

summary: GOOD OMENS: Best. Apocalypse. Ever. | Film Inquiry
body:
GOOD OMENS: Best. Apocalypse. Ever. | Film Inquiry

“Michael Sheen and David Tennant are two cosmic forces that clash and harmonize together so well that you might think you’re watching a meteor shower lighting up the night sky, but you’re not. You’re just watching two actors play off of each other in roles that they were born to play.

Tennant is seductively contagious as the demon Crowley. You haven’t lived until you’ve seen him, clad in black and eyes blazing yellow, bellowing at his houseplants to teach them to grow better. Tennant carries Crowley with the refined, carefree attitude that only a demon facing the end could have, and yet he allows Crowley’s soft side to bleed through just enough so that we’re able to root for him without, you know, rooting for an embodiment of evil.

“Michael Sheen’s Aziraphale is the cool side of the pillow after a long day of travel. He’s the just right amount of sugar in your morning coffee. Maybe it’s his cream-colored tartan clothing, or his irresistible smile and joy in all things good, but when you watch his performance, you feel as though that thing you were worrying about suddenly feels manageable. He plays Aziraphale as the affable book lover that we all want angels to be, so that when he loses his composure, the show becomes urgent and the most exciting thing you can watch.

But however wonderful these two are in their performances, it’s nothing compared to how they are together. Sheen and Tennant are a match made in, much to Aziraphale’s delight, heaven. They bicker like an old married couple, and they aren’t afraid to show their affection for each other as the end looms nearer and nearer. It’s a beautiful relationship to watch span over six thousand years, and one that I feel privileged to get to see. When the end does come and the dust clears, I’ll still be here shouting the praises of Sheen and Tennant, the greatest duo of the last few millennia.”

summary: His forehead creased for a moment, and then he slapped the steering wheel triumphantly. “Ducks!” he shouted. “What?” “That’s...
caption: His forehead creased for a moment, and then he slapped the steering wheel triumphantly. “Ducks!” he shouted. “What?” “That’s what water slides off!” Aziraphale took a deep breath. “Just drive the car, please,” he said wearily.

reblog.comment: His forehead creased for a moment, and then he slapped the steering wheel triumphantly. “Ducks!” he shouted. “What?” “That’s what water slides off!” Aziraphale took a deep breath. “Just drive the car, please,” he said wearily.

trail.content_raw: His forehead creased for a moment, and then he slapped the steering wheel triumphantly. “Ducks!” he shouted. “What?” “That’s what water slides off!” Aziraphale took a deep breath. “Just drive the car, please,” he said wearily.
trail.content: His forehead creased for a moment, and then he slapped the steering wheel triumphantly. “Ducks!” he shouted. “What?” “That’s what water slides off!” Aziraphale took a deep breath. “Just drive the car, please,” he said wearily.

summary: Good Omens is the most perfect book to screen adaptation I have ever seen and I will never stop talking about it. An absolute...
body: Good Omens is the most perfect book to screen adaptation I have ever seen and I will never stop talking about it. An absolute dream portrayal of Crowley and Aziraphale from David Tennant and Michael Sheen. I am head over heels in love. I want to live in the feeling I had while watching this show.

reblog.comment: Good Omens is the most perfect book to screen adaptation I have ever seen and I will never stop talking about it. An absolute dream portrayal of Crowley and Aziraphale from David Tennant and Michael Sheen. I am head over heels in love. I want to live in the feeling I had while watching this show.

An absolute dream portrayal of Crowley and Aziraphale from David Tennant and Michael Sheen. I am head over heels in love. I want to live in the feeling I had while watching this show.
